Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. With its unique features and exceptional quality, it's truly a valuable asset. Considering its craftsmanship and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $180. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find it compelling enough to consider. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
